subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nic Petan broke a tie on a power play with 2 minutes 46 seconds left in Canada’s 5-3 comeback victory over Slovakia at the world junior hockey tournament in Malmo, Sweden.
snippet: Nic Petan broke a tie on a power play with 2 minutes 46 seconds left in Canada’s 5-3 comeback victory over Slovakia at the world junior hockey tournament in Malmo, Sweden.
